languages.text: Покидая системы некронов, Номос уничтожили каждую планету-гробницу древних ксеносов. Некая извечная вражда, пробудившаяся в юном божестве, потребовала предать миры немертвых забвению.

As they were leaving the Necron systems, Nomos destroyed every Tomb World of the ancient xenos. Some eternal strife had awakened within the young deity, demanding that the planets of the undead be obliterated.
languages.original_text: Покидая системы некронов, Номос уничтожили каждую планету-гробницу древних ксеносов. Некая извечная вражда, пробудившаяся в юном божестве, потребовала предать миры немертвых забвению.

traits.locale_text: As Nomos was leaving the Necron systems, they destroyed every Tomb World of the ancient xenos. Some eternal strife had awakened within the young deity and demanded that the planets of the undead be obliterated.

As Nomos was leaving the Necron systems, they destroyed every Tomb World of the ancient xenos. Some eternal strife had awakened within the young deity and demanded that the planets of the undead be obliterated.

As they were leaving the Necron systems, Nomos destroyed every Tomb World of the ancient xenos. Some eternal strife had awakened within the young deity, demanding that the planets of the undead be obliterated.

As they were leaving the Necron systems, Nomos destroyed every Tomb World of the ancient xenos. Some eternal strife had awakened within the young deity, demanding that the planets of the undead be obliterated.

languages.text: En quittant les systèmes nécrons, Nomos détruisit tous les mondes-nécropoles de l'antique civilisation xénos. Une sorte de dissension immuable s'était éveillée chez la jeune divinité et lui avait intimé d'annihiler les planètes des morts-vivants.
languages.original_text: As they were leaving the Necron systems, Nomos destroyed every Tomb World of the ancient xenos. Some eternal strife had awakened within the young deity, demanding that the planets of the undead be obliterated.

traits.locale_text: En quittant les systèmes nécrons, Nomos détruisit tous les mondes-nécropoles de l'antique civilisation xénos. Une sorte de dissension immuable s'était éveillée chez la jeune divinité et lui avait intimé d'annihiler les planètes des morts-vivants.

languages.text: Mientras abandonaban los sistemas Necrones, Nomos destruyó cada mundo necrópolis de los antiguos xenos. Un conflicto eterno había despertado en el joven dios, y le exigía erradicar los planetas de los muertos vivientes.
languages.original_text: As they were leaving the Necron systems, Nomos destroyed every Tomb World of the ancient xenos. Some eternal strife had awakened within the young deity, demanding that the planets of the undead be obliterated.

traits.locale_text: Mientras abandonaban los sistemas Necrones, Nomos destruyó cada mundo necrópolis de los antiguos xenos. Un conflicto eterno había despertado en el joven dios, y le exigía erradicar los planetas de los muertos vivientes.

languages.text: 当诺莫斯离开太空死灵的星系时，祂摧毁了那些古代异形的所有墓穴世界。某种永恒不灭的斗争意识在这位年轻的神明心中觉醒，渴望将太空死灵的众多行星彻底抹除。
languages.original_text: As they were leaving the Necron systems, Nomos destroyed every Tomb World of the ancient xenos. Some eternal strife had awakened within the young deity, demanding that the planets of the undead be obliterated.

traits.locale_text: 当诺莫斯离开太空死灵的星系时，祂摧毁了那些古代异形的所有墓穴世界。某种永恒不灭的斗争意识在这位年轻的神明心中觉醒，渴望将太空死灵的众多行星彻底抹除。

languages.text: ネクロンの星系を去り際、ノモスは古代異種族の墓世界を残らず破壊した。若い神の内で終わりのない争いが目を覚まし、それらの墓世界を徹底的に消し去れと駆り立てたからだ。
languages.original_text: As they were leaving the Necron systems, Nomos destroyed every Tomb World of the ancient xenos. Some eternal strife had awakened within the young deity, demanding that the planets of the undead be obliterated.

traits.locale_text: ネクロンの星系を去り際、ノモスは古代異種族の墓世界を残らず破壊した。若い神の内で終わりのない争いが目を覚まし、それらの墓世界を徹底的に消し去れと駆り立てたからだ。

languages.text: Nekron sistemlerinden ayrılındığı sırada Nomos, kadim zenoların her bir Kabir Dünyasını yok etti. Genç ilahın içinde uyanan ebedî çekişme, hortlak gezegenlerinin yok edilmesini talep ediyordu.
languages.original_text: As they were leaving the Necron systems, Nomos destroyed every Tomb World of the ancient xenos. Some eternal strife had awakened within the young deity, demanding that the planets of the undead be obliterated.

traits.locale_text: Nekron sistemlerinden ayrılındığı sırada Nomos, kadim zenoların her bir Kabir Dünyasını yok etti. Genç ilahın içinde uyanan ebedî çekişme, hortlak gezegenlerinin yok edilmesini talep ediyordu.
